about_the_game:
"Bozalleth's Curse" is a first-person horror game with dynamic lighting. The game unfolds the story of Mary, who encounters an unfortunate accident. Players will have to uncover the mystery alongside Maria.

  • Survival struggle – even in the most nightmarish situations, monsters can inflict irreparable harm, even leading to death.

  • Dynamic lighting – in the game world, light not only illuminates the surroundings and objects but can also go out at the most inconvenient moment, exposing you to danger. Enemies will also seek to extinguish light sources.

  • Deep dialogues – meet various characters with whom the main heroine will interact. Their attitude towards you and the fate of the game world will depend on your choices.

  • Journey through words – unravel mysteries by reading notes and books that will reveal the thoughts of characters or provide excerpts from a world full of puzzles and dangers.

content_descriptors.notes:
In our game, the main heroine finds herself in a situation where she must confront monsters and ghosts. Throughout the game, she may encounter violence and cruelty from these entities, which can result in her death. Additionally, the game allows for interactions and conversations with deceased characters.

In certain situations within the game, the main heroine may find herself in her underwear due to specific story or gameplay elements. This is not intended to be sexually explicit but is designed to add tension and vulnerability to certain scenes.

We recommend reviewing the game's ratings and description before making a purchase to ensure that the content aligns with your preferences and expectations. If you have any further questions regarding the game's content, feel free to consult the description or contact our customer support.

Please be aware that the provided description is honest and informative so that potential players can make an informed decision about purchasing the game.
